ygData.subject: RE: something to check in Akanon...
ygData.msgSnippet: best place i ve found for Duster X is the cavern right before the one with the wheel, on the ledge across the water from the main path...near the broken
ygData.messageBody:
best place i've found for Duster X is the cavern right before the one with
the wheel, on the ledge across the water from the main path...near the
broken wagon...but still pretty rare...
Xillitil/Povar

>one spawns near the water weel and the other spawns near the first gate to
>akanon they both travel a lot
>
>
>From: "Graham Kays" <gkays@...>
>
>Where did you find DusterX and how often does it spawn? I've killed
>DusterV
>a number of times. I've also seen a CleanerX, but never a DusterX. I
>really want to finish this quest and it's bugging me that I can't find it
>after hours of searching.
>
>Gnizer (11th level Gnome Rogue of Cazic-Thule)
